pullRequest.title: Update jackson-databind to 2.8.11.6
pullRequest.bodyText:
This commit upgrades the jackson-databind depdendency to 2.8.11.6. Additionally, we revert a previous change that put ingest-geoip on the version of jackson-databind from the version properties file. This is because upgrading ingest-geoip to a later version of jackson-databind also requires an upgrade to the geoip2 dependency which is currently blocked. Therefore, if we can get to a point where we otherwise upgrade our Jackson dependencies, we do not want ingest-geoip to automatically come along with it.
Relates #45225

commit.message:
Update jackson-databind to 2.8.11.6

This commit upgrades the jackson-databind depdendency to
2.8.11.6. Additionally, we revert a previous change that put
ingest-geoip on the version of jackson-databind from the version
properties file. This is because upgrading ingest-geoip to a later
version of jackson-databind also requires an upgrade to the geoip2
dependency which is currently blocked. Therefore, if we can get to a
point where we otherwise upgrade our Jackson dependencies, we do not
want ingest-geoip to automatically come along with it.

nodes.bodyText: Should these still use the ${versions.jackson} (etc) substitution instead of being hardcoded?
